chart.name: chart.wkf.tracking.status.per.month
chart.title: Status per month
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.totalCount) AS total, self.status as status, CONCAT(MONTH(self.createdOn),'/',YEAR(self.createdOn)) AS month FROM WkfTrackingTotal self WHERE DATE(self.createdOn) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) and DATE(:toDate) and self.wkfTracking.wkf.id = :_wkfId GROUP BY status, CONCAT(MONTH(self.createdOn),'/',YEAR(self.createdOn)) ORDER BY month

chart.name: chart.wkf.tracking.status.per.day
chart.title: Status per day
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.totalCount) AS total, self.status as status, to_char(self.createdOn,'MM/dd/yyyy') AS day FROM WkfTrackingTotal self WHERE DATE(self.createdOn) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) and DATE(:toDate) and self.wkfTracking.wkf.id = :_wkfId GROUP BY status, to_char(self.createdOn,'MM/dd/yyyy') ORDER BY day

chart.name: chart.wkf.tracking.time.spent.per.status
chart.title: Time spent per status (hours)
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.totalTimeHours) AS total, self.status as status FROM WkfTrackingTime self WHERE DATE(self.createdOn) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) and DATE(:toDate) and self.wkfTracking.wkf.id = :_wkfId GROUP BY status ORDER BY status

chart.name: chart.wkf.tracking.time.spent.per.status.per.user
chart.title: Time spent per status per user (hours)
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.timeSpent) AS total, self.status as status, User.name as userName FROM WkfTrackingLine self LEFT JOIN self.createdBy AS User WHERE DATE(self.createdOn) BETWEEN DATE(:fromDate) and DATE(:toDate) and self.wkfTracking.wkf.id = :_wkfId GROUP BY User.name, status ORDER BY userName, status
